about_the_game:
"Extraordinary: Monster" is a point-and-click puzzle game created by TeatimeWorkshop
The story begins with E.I. senior investigator Karena tracking down a tragic murder case. The investigation in the abandoned Alberto laboratory made Karena feel that this was no ordinary murder case. Rare equipment, scratches on the wall, purple... Liquids, twisted animal cages... everything gradually points to the suspect-Professor Selon

Game features:
The operation and gameplay of the game are simple and easy to understand. Even if you have never played point-and-click puzzle games, you can easily get started.
The story in the game is presented in a unique picture book style, which will make you unable to put it down.
The puzzle design is rigorous and varied, supplemented by a variety of mini-games, making logic and fun coexist.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Extraordinary: Monster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Karena received an urgent mission: to hunt down Professor Selon who killed his wife and children. However, various signs showed that the matter was not a simple murder. Karena followed the clues to the abandoned Alberto laboratory, and the case actually led to a strange crystal Block - ENP
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
